name: Vitality Cake
desc:
Can be exchanged for fun banquet rewards. 
<style=brown>Looks like a delicious cake.</style>

name: Trophy
desc:
Used to exchange for spoils. 
<style=brown>Earned with blood and iron, equal to the weight of life and beliefs.</style>

name: Crusade Points
desc: Proof of successfully defeating the Calamity, accumulate enough points to receive rich rewards.

name: Rumor Point
desc: Can be used to exchange for a variety of precious rewards in the Shop.

name: TP
desc:
Can be used to unlock attributes and tactics in Tactical Awakening.
<style=brown>A true warrior is only born on the battlefield.</style>

name: Spring Wish Firecrackers
desc: Embrace the Springwish Festival with fervent and resounding celebrations!

name: Wish Fridge Magnet
desc:
Can be used to exchange for precious souvenirs.
<style=brown>These adorable fridge magnets hold everyone's hopeful visions for the future.</style>

name: Trading Post Credit Voucher
desc: Anonymous exchange vouchers circulating within the Trading Post—lost ones will not be replaced!

name: Convallaria Cake
desc:
Used to exchange for precious souvenirs.
<style=brown>Convallaria-shaped cakes, iconic food for the festival.</style>

name: Rumor Point
desc: Can be used to exchange for a variety of precious rewards in the Shop.
